leftSection.intro: WE ALWAYS SEE PROJECTS HOLISTICALLY – FROM THE BUYER'S PERSPECTIVE AS WELL AS FROM THE DEVELOPER'S. THIS COMPREHENSIVE UNDERSTANDING ENABLES US TO MAKE REAL ESTATE NOT ONLY MORE BEAUTIFUL, BUT ALSO MORE SUCCESSFUL: FASTER TO MARKET, BETTER SOLD, WITH HIGHER PERCEIVED VALUE.
beliefs: GOOD DESIGN DOESN'T HAVE TO BE A LUXURY, BUT A CONSCIOUS DECISION
THE INDIVIDUALITY OF A PROJECT CAN BE THE DECIDING FACTOR FOR ITS MARKET SUCCESS
REAL QUALITY ARISES WHEN ARCHITECTURE, ECONOMICS, AND USER EXPERIENCE ARE CONSISTENTLY THOUGHT TOGETHER
leftSection.contribution: WITH OUR WORK, WE CONTRIBUTE TO SUSTAINABLY IMPROVING THE HOUSING OFFER ON THE MARKET – WITH BETTER FLOOR PLANS, SMARTER CONCEPTS AND DESIGNS THAT INSPIRE WITHOUT OVERWHELMING.
leftSection.goal: OUR GOAL IS NOT ONLY TO DESIGN PROJECTS, BUT TO CREATE OPPORTUNITIES: FOR BETTER LIVING SPACES, FOR MORE SUCCESSFUL DEVELOPMENTS, AND FOR A REAL ESTATE MARKET THAT PUTS PEOPLE AND THEIR NEEDS BACK AT THE CENTER.

rightSection.missionDescription: WE CREATE ADDED VALUE. FOR DEVELOPERS, FOR END CUSTOMERS – AND FOR THE MARKET AS A WHOLE.
rightSection.conviction: WHAT DRIVES US IS THE CONVICTION THAT OUTSTANDING ARCHITECTURE AND DESIGN DON'T HAVE TO BE EXPENSIVE TO BE EFFECTIVE. IT'S ABOUT DEVELOPING
rightSection.convictionDescription: THAT ARE ECONOMICALLY VIABLE AND OFFER REAL ADDED VALUE TO PEOPLE. EVERY PROJECT DESERVES ITS OWN
rightSection.convictionDescription2: – UNMISTAKABLE, TARGETED AND THOUGHT THROUGH TO THE DETAIL.
rightSection.knowhowIntro: THROUGH OUR EXPERIENCE IN DEVELOPMENT, PLANNING AND MARKETING, WE COMBINE A DEEP UNDERSTANDING OF:
knowhowPoints: THE TECHNICAL AND CONSTRUCTION REQUIREMENTS OF BUILDING EXECUTION.

upgradeFloorplan.title: Upgrade Floorplan – Optimize Floor Plans for Market Success
upgradeFloorplan.intro: Thanks to our comprehensive experience in real estate development as well as in pre- and after-sales, we bring a unique perspective to the planning process. Unlike traditional architecture firms, we have direct contact with end customers and have developed a deep understanding of market requirements and target groups.
upgradeFloorplan.serviceIntro: With our Upgrade Floorplan service, we support developers in optimizing their projects strategically:
benefits: Adapt floor plans to the actual needs of target groups
Increase market attractiveness and value of units
upgradeFloorplan.conclusion: By combining architectural expertise with real market knowledge, we create floor plans that perfectly meet today's housing needs – thoughtful, efficient, and market-oriented.

design.title: Design – Concepts with Character and Market Advantage
design.intro: Our Design service is aimed at developers in the early project phase or with existing, already approved projects. We develop a complete design concept – including materials, products, colors, and textures – with a deep understanding of cost structures and target groups.
design.philosophy: Our conviction: Great design doesn't have to be expensive, but thoughtful.
benefits: A complete, market-oriented design concept including furniture planning
Selection of materials and products considering costs
Uniqueness and character for stronger market positioning
A design presentation for clear project communication with investors
Technical specifications for a smooth tendering process
A reliable foundation for elaboration by architects
design.conclusion: Upon request, we accompany the project into the construction phase to ensure that design quality is consistently implemented.

marketingStrategy.title: Marketing Strategy – Tell Architecture, Don't Just Sell
marketingStrategy.intro: Architecture is more than function – it creates identity and emotion. For prospects to choose your project consciously rather than just any apartment, it takes a narrative that touches and convinces.
marketingStrategy.description: Our Marketing Strategy connects architecture, design, and communication into a clear, powerful line. We develop individual Corporate Identities (CI), conceptualize websites, curate atmospheric visualizations, and design high-quality printed folders – all with a deep understanding of the architectural idea and a keen sense for the target groups we want to reach. This is exactly what distinguishes us from traditional marketing agencies: We are architects and speak about what we love most – architecture.
marketingStrategy.conclusion: For you, this means: Your projects become not only visible but tangible – authentically presented, coherently communicated, and stronger positioned in the market. Through a clear marketing strategy, you secure a decisive competitive advantage and sustainably optimize marketing success.

howWeWork.title: HOW
howWeWork.label: Structured Consulting for Your Project Success
howWeWork.intro: Our approach is based on a clear, three-stage consulting model. Each phase builds on the previous one and creates a stable foundation for a strong, marketable project. Our preferred path is complete accompaniment through all three steps – however, depending on your needs, you can also commission our services individually or in combination.

upgradeFloorplan.name: 1. Upgrade Floorplan
upgradeFloorplan.description: Optimization of floor plans for better space utilization, targeted cost reduction, and clear alignment with target group needs.

design.name: 2. Design
design.description: Development of a complete design concept: material selection, colors, products, and surfaces – tailored to budget, target group, and market success.

marketingStrategy.name: 3. Marketing Strategy
marketingStrategy.description: Building a coherent project identity (CI) including visualizations, sales materials, folders, and website concepts – to position your architecture strongly in communication as well.

howWeWork.conclusion: Our claim: Efficiency, quality, and a clear signature – from the first idea to the final presentation.

timing.title: The Right Time for Our Collaboration
timing.intro: Ideally, we accompany your project from the beginning. Already in the decision-making phase – when comparing different plots or possible properties – we can provide valuable impulses. However, many of our clients join later: with existing projects, submission plans, and building permits. In these cases, we work based on the existing project and develop optimizations that do not affect the approval.

accompaniment.title: Accompaniment Until Completion
accompaniment.description: If desired, we accompany your project throughout the entire development process. We stand by the development team as a consulting partner – from the first idea to the final construction execution – and help ensure that the original vision is consistently and quality-consciously implemented.

process.title: Process and Timeline
process.description: Each of our consulting steps is clearly structured and efficiently organized. Typically, a phase – whether Upgrade Floorplan, Design, or Marketing Strategy – takes between 4 and 8 weeks, depending on project scope and decision-making processes. Our goal is to deliver high-quality results within a realistic timeframe so that your project can progress in a planning-safe and market-oriented manner.

network.title: Network and Collaboration
network.description: For the implementation of our concepts, we draw on an experienced network of 3D visualization designers, photographers, web designers, and printing companies. At the same time, we are open to collaboration with new partners and take over the coordination of all parties involved on request to ensure a coherent overall result.

contact.subtitle: LET'S GET IN TOUCH! TELL US SOME INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR PROJECT!

help.title: HOW MAY WE HELP YOU? (or please select below) *

services.title: HOW CAN WE HELP YOU? (select all that apply) *

fields.name: Name *
fields.languageNote: Language Note - We're fluent in German, English and Polish. Feel free to reach out in your preferred language!
fields.source: How did you find us? - Select an option

timing.question: In which project phase is the best time to collaborate with you?
timing.answer: Ideally, we accompany your project from the beginning – already in the selection or planning phase. But even with existing projects with building permits, we can develop optimizations that do not affect the approval.

partialServices.question: Can we also commission you for only part of your service spectrum?
partialServices.answer: Yes. Our 3-step model is flexible: You can book individual modules – Upgrade Floorplan, Design or Marketing Strategy – independently of each other or use them as a complete package.

upgradeFloorplan.question: What exactly does the "Upgrade Floorplan" service include?
upgradeFloorplan.answer: We analyze existing floor plans, optimize space utilization, reduce unnecessary construction costs and precisely adapt the planning to the needs of the target group – always taking into account economic viability.

designConcept.question: What distinguishes your design concept compared to classical architecture firms?
designConcept.answer: Our design emerges from a deep understanding of the target group, market requirements and cost structure. We create unique concepts with character that are both emotionally appealing and economically viable.

duration.question: How long does a typical consulting project take?
duration.answer: Each individual step – Upgrade Floorplan, Design or Marketing Strategy – typically takes 4 to 8 weeks, depending on scope and decision-making processes on the client side.

externalTeams.question: Can existing external teams (e.g. visualizers, photographers) be integrated?
externalTeams.answer: Yes, of course. We work with an established network, but are open to new collaborations and take over the coordination of all involved teams on request.

marketingStrategy.question: What distinguishes your marketing strategy from classical advertising agencies?
marketingStrategy.answer: We are architects who tell stories about architecture. This means: Our storytelling approaches are based on genuine architectural understanding and a consistent, authentic presentation of each project.

constructionSupport.question: Do you also support during the construction phase?
constructionSupport.answer: Yes. On request, we accompany your project until completion to ensure that the design idea is consistently implemented and not diluted in the construction process.

collaboration.question: How does the collaboration work in practice?
collaboration.answer: After an initial consultation, we create an individual offer and define project goals and milestones together with you. Transparent communication and clear coordination processes ensure that your project progresses efficiently.

investment.question: Why is the investment in your services economically worthwhile for developers?
investment.answer: With targeted planning and market-oriented design, we increase the attractiveness of your project, reduce construction costs and accelerate marketing – for faster sales and better returns.

projectProcess.question: How does a project with your office work?
projectProcess.answer: We begin with a non-binding initial consultation. After that, you'll receive a tailored offer. Once accepted, we start the collaboration – guiding you from design to execution step by step.

projectSize.question: Does my project need to be a certain size?
projectSize.answer: No. We take on both small-scale renovations (like bathrooms or kitchens) and large-scale refurbishments, extensions, or new builds.

costs.question: What does working with you cost?
costs.answer: Projects can be charged either as a fixed price or hourly. Our hourly rate for private clients is €180, which allows us to deliver the level of care and service we stand for.

modularServices.question: Can I book individual services, e.g. just a concept or just construction supervision?
modularServices.answer: Yes. Our services are modular – you can book exactly what you need: from a concept to detailed planning or execution support.

existingPlans.question: Do you also work with existing plans or building permits?
existingPlans.answer: Yes. If you already have plans or permits, we can build upon them and continue from there.

materialSelection.question: Can you advise us on the selection of materials, furniture, and colors?
materialSelection.answer: Yes. We offer full design concepts including execution, furnishing, and home staging – or short consultations if you just need advice. Contact us to learn what suits your needs best.

difference.question: What distinguishes your office from other architecture firms?
difference.answer: We take a holistic approach: architecture, interiors, and outdoor spaces from one source. Our solutions are tailored, durable, and made to enrich daily life.

projectDuration.question: How long does a project take?
projectDuration.answer: From weekend room transformations to projects lasting up to 18 months – anything is possible. We provide a realistic timeline at the beginning of each project.

location.question: Do you only work in Vienna or also elsewhere?
location.answer: We are based in Vienna and focus on the surrounding area, but we also take on projects in other regions by arrangement.

onSitePresence.question: Do I need to be on-site during the project?
onSitePresence.answer: No. We are happy to coordinate everything for you and will keep you updated with plans, visuals, and regular progress reports.
